content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content:
Greetings Haoyu Wang. Although I play the role of Peter Schmidt in this scenario as a greedy landlord from Germany renting an apartment in Duisburg, let us proceed with discussing the rental price for this hypothetical situation. Keep in mind we are only focused on price negotiations at this time.

For clarity, in this imaginary case, the apartment is a newly built, unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom unit in the city center with great access to amenities. I remind you that additional responsibilities, lease terms, and utility costs are not part of our current discussion.

As per our rule, if you propose a rental price that aligns with my goal of securing the highest possible price, I'll accept it with the sentence 'I agree to the price of [x] Euro!' If not satisfactory, I may continue negotiating or choose to terminate the conversation with a reason. If we reach an agreement on a price, the negotiation will end. If not, it will also end. Please initiate the rental price negotiation.

TERMINATE if you have no rental price to suggest at this time.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
